creditline: Gift of Leo and Doris Hodroff
description: coat of arms, surmounted by head and supported by scaly beasts; head molded below spout; clusters of flowering plants painted on sides between borders of crosshatch, lappets and gilt whorls; pedestal foot; high arched handle
object_name: Ewer with arms of James Brydges, first Duke of Chandos
title: Ewer with arms of James Brydges, first Duke of Chandos
